purpose: The email announces the 5th IEEE International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ'25), scheduled for December 13, 2025, at Ural Federal University in Russia. It invites researchers to submit papers and abstracts by August 10, 2025, and outlines the conference's goals to improve source code quality through collaboration and sharing of ideas. The email also provides details about the program committee, publication criteria, and submission guidelines.
evidence_sentences: Name: 5th International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ)

We aim to solve this problem by gathering together cutting-edge researchers and letting them share their most recent ideas on static analysis, program verification, bug detection, and software maintenance.
Papers will be reviewed by three PC members using a double-blind review process.
Submissions must be in PDF, printable in black and white on US Letter sized paper.
